headline: Analysts Lift Price Targets on Lam Research Corporation (LRCX ) Following Strong Quarter Results
summary: Lam Research Corporation (NASDAQ:LRCX) is among the 12 Most Profitable NASDAQ Stocks to Buy Right Now. On January 28, the company reported strong results for the quarter ending December 2025, topping estimates. Revenue came in at $5.34 billion, surpassing Wall Street’s expectations of $5.26 billion. Adjusted earnings were logged at $1.27 per share, beating estimates by […]
